== Introduction ==

SCORM is [http://www.adlnet.gov/Technologies/scorm/default.aspx ADL standard] for storing test results on the server (usually it is LMS).

To add SCORM support:
  # Upload scorm folder to you browser and include APIWrapper.js file
  # Define onAssessmentFinished() function and send results using SCOMR protocol.

== Sample HTML fragment with SCORM support: ==
{{{
<script type="text/javascript" language="javascript" src="scorm/APIWrapper.js"></script>
<script language="javascript">
  function qpOnAppLoaded(){
    // Load assessment
    var player = qpCreatePlayer('player');
    player.load('content/test.xml');

    // Send results via SCORM
    player.onAssessmentFinished = function(result){
      doLMSInitialize();
      doLMSSetScore(result.score, result.max);
      doLMSCommit();
      doLMSFinish();
    }
  }
</script>
}}}
